title: Did Criminal Justice Activist Donna Hylton Speak at the Democratic National Convention?
subtitle: Rumors circulated online that Hylton, who was convicted of a grisly 1985 murder and spent decades behind bars, spoke at the DNC.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Donna Hylton, who was convicted of the 1985 kidnapping, torture, and murder of a real estate broker, spoke at the Democratic National Convention in August 2020.
